HOW WE MAKE YOUR DRESS

choose your favourite style, change the sleeves, neckline, skirt, length, COLOUR, add details like an obi belt, faux-leather trim or peplum

START DESIGNING

DESIGN YOUR OWN

SHOP THE COLLECTION

HOW IT WORKS

1. Choose

CHOOSE your favourite dress silhouette or ready-to-buy design

2. Customise

Either click:

  • CUSTOMISE to change anything you want
  • BUY to take it as it is.

3. Deliver

Once you have paid through our secure payment gateway, we will make your design exclusively for you and send it to you within 4 weeks.

We hope that you will CHERISH your creation.

But if it is not exactly how you dreamt it would be we will provide up to 300HKD for local tailoring, remake it free-of-charge or offer a full refund if returned unworn within 30 days of purchase*

* local tailoring cost refunded based on a receipt for work done and all garments to be returned must have the return tag intact in the garment.

Don't worry it's very simple and our fit-or-return guarantee gives you the confidence of your favourite brand or store
